short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter out shorts from YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of being bombarded with endless short-form videos on YouTube? Do you find yourself scrolling through countless Shorts, trying to find the content you actually want to watch? If so, we have the solution for you!

Introducing our brand new browser extension that hides all Shorts videos from your YouTube feed. With just a few clicks, you can say goodbye to those annoying 60-second clips and hello to a cleaner, more focused YouTube experience.

Our extension is easy to install and use. Simply download it to your browser and let it do the work for you. You'll still be able to enjoy all of the great content YouTube has to offer, without the distraction of Shorts cluttering up your feed.

Say goodbye to mindless scrolling and hello to a more productive, enjoyable YouTube experience with our Shorts-hiding browser extension. Try it out today and see the difference for yourself!
